question: Shahid Beheshti Port, sometimes seen in the news, is located in which country?
explanation: The 19<sup>th</sup> session of the India-Iran Joint Commission was recently held in Tehran and both the countries have expressed their satisfaction on the progress achieved in operationalizing the Shahid Beheshti Port, Chabahar. Chabahar port serves as Iran’s only oceanic port consisting of two separate ports – Shahid Kalantari port and Shahid Beheshti.
